title: 50% off book sale
content:
There is a 50% off sale at Oak Knoll Press. A great purchase: McGrew, Mac, AMERICAN METAL TYPEFACES OF THE TWENTIETH CENTURY.   
   
 [http://www.oakknoll.com/50offsale.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014013827/http:/www.oakknoll.com/50offsale.html)   
   
Nathalie Dumont
author: dumont
